[docs]def CreationPlaylist(resultat):
    '''
        fonction de creation de playlist

        :param resultat: blabla
        :return: blabla

        '''

    pl = open("pl.m3u","w")
    pl.write("#EXTM3U")
    for i in range(len(resultat)):
    j=resultat[i]
    pl.write("\nEXTINF:")
    pl.write(str(i))
    pl.write(", ")
    pl.write(j.titre)
    pl.write("\n")
    pl.write(j.emplacement)
    pl.close()
